Name: ACType
Label: AC Wiring Type
Notes:
0x00 Single-phase 240 v / 230 v / 220 v
0x01 Stands for two-phase 120V/240V
0x02 Represents the three-phase system
208V/120V

Name: W
Label: Active Power
Sol-Ark Register Desc: Total power of grid side L1L2

Name: A
Label: Total AC Current
Sol-Ark Register Desc: Grid side current L1 + Grid side current L2
